config.connectError: Connection error to the server. The configuration does not seem correct
config.title: Setting the url and token for access to the grist server
config.urlSet: Grist server URL (that starts with https:// and without '/' in the end)

help.config: configure url & token of Grist server
help.docAccess: list of users with access to the document
help.docExportCsv: export document's table as CSV in stdout
help.docExportExcel: export document as <workspace name>_<doc name>.xlsx Excel file
help.docExportGrist: export document as <workspace name>_<doc name>.grist Grist file
help.docPurge: purges document history (retains last 3 operations by default)
help.userList: list of users with thier roles
help.version: displays the version of the program
help.workspaceAccess: list of users with access to the workspace
